agents.title: Ejen
agents.help_text: Your team is the face of your business, engaging and conversing with your users. You can see the full list of agents, add new agents, and edit agent details from this page.
agents.help_html:
An Agent is a member of your Customer Support/Engagement team. Agents will be able to view and reply to messages from your users. The list shows all Agents currently in your account. Hover over an Agent to see the option to edit details for that agent, or click on ‚ÄúAdd Agent‚Äù to add a new Agent. Agents you add will receive an email with a confirmation link to activate their account, after which they can access and respond to messages.

Access to Freshchat features are based on an Agent's role -

Agent - Agents with this role can only access the Team Inbox and conversations.

Super User - Super Users have access to Campaigns and FAQs in addition to the Team Inbox, but cannot see or modify any common settings.

Admin - Admin will have access to all Freshchat features enabled for your account.

You can also organize Agents into Groups. You can create Groups {help_link}

featureGating.header: Laporan: Dapatkan maklumat mengenai penglibatan pelanggan anda
featureGating.header_text:
Analyze your team performance and business metrics on customer engagement at a daily, weekly, or monthly timeframe.

Slice and dice data by date/time range and team member groups. Export your reports to share with management or agents.
featureGating.heading3Text:
Track trends on your conversation volumes, response rates, resolution time, first response times and assignment time, to analyze the experience you are delivering to customers and figure out your staffing needs.

You can look at these metrics on a daily, weekly, and monthly basis between a given start and end time. Group-wise filtering makes it easy to track numbers for specific groups of agents based on territory or function.
featureGating.heading1Text: Analyze the productivity of agents in a given period of time. Know how your agents or agents of a specific group are performing - their response times, resolution times and the number of conversations they are handling and resolving within a given time frame.
featureGating.heading2Text: Terokai penilaian kepuasan pelanggan (CSAT) pada tahap ahli pasukan dari masa ke masa untuk melihat siapa yang memerlukan bantuan. Bahagi maklumat mengikut kumpulan dan ukur % respons yang memuaskan dan penilaian CSAT purata.

featureGating.header_text: Pantau semua metrik prestasi penting - sama ada respons masa, kepuasan pelanggan atau produktiviti pasukan. Gunakan maklumat dan trend untuk membuat keputusan berdasarkan data untuk meningkatkan pengalaman pelanggan anda dan membantu meningkatkan prestasi pasukan anda.
featureGating.heading1Text: Adakah pasukan anda menjaga kepuasan hati pelanggan? Lihat penilaian yang diberikan oleh pelanggan untuk setiap perbualan dalam masa nyata, dan menyelam jauh ke dalam senarai perbualan dengan maklum balas positif atau negatif. Akses juga penilaian setiap ahli pasukan untuk perbualan yang berjaya diselesaikan.
featureGating.heading2Text: Keep a close tab on your conversation volume trend through the day. Identify your peak times and plan your staffing better. Compare the current day's volumes to the last week to identify any deviations from the norm.
featureGating.heading3Text: Monitor the customer experience you are delivering with updated metrics on your first response time, average response time, and resolution times. Know if conversations are waiting to be assigned to agents, or if your teams are overloaded, and unable to respond in time.

agents.heading1Text: Know which agents are doing well, and who needs help in real time. Monitor details like the throughput of conversations, quality of engagement, and metrics like response times and resolution times. Find patterns on how response times or messages exchanged influence ratings.

carousel.labelText1: See what your key performance metrics trend over time - first response time, response times, and resolution times. Look at 90th percentile of the metrics, and averages, in addition to median values. See how the response times, resolution times of the current day compare to the volume of incoming conversations. Recognize patterns that are hampering your team's rhythm and make data driven decisions.
carousel.labelText2: Know which agents are doing well, and who needs help in real time. Monitor details like the throughput of conversations, quality of engagement, and metrics like response times and resolution times. Find patterns on how response times or messages exchanged influence ratings.
carousel.labelText3: Use Conversation Labels for analysis of past conversations. Identify trends of conversation drivers over time, and detect issues quickly based on Label patterns.

featureGating.learn_more_text: Perhatikan metrik utama dengan lebih dekat dan kadar tindak balas pasukan anda dengan metrik terperinci.
